trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_SEQ_00<tab>Warm hands work more swiftly, or so Vuyargur believes.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Xarhorkur at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to the Yok Huy supplier.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_SEQ_03<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Xarhorkur at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.

TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the Yok Huy supplier)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.

TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_VUYARGUR_000_000<tab>Xarhorkur, one of our toolkeepers, was kind enough to prepare us portable hand warmers to stave off the mountain's bitter chill. To prolong their use, however, we must swap out their components from time to time.

TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It is time once again for a few of our hand warmer components to be replaced. Might I request your assistance?

TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>We must ensure the warmers remain at a reasonable temperature, so I'd like to entrust you with the creation of new parts. Xarhorkur possesses the materials for the job─simply ask, and she shall provide.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_XARHORKUR_000_005<tab>Here about the hand warmers, yes? Very good. I'm relieved we have a crafter like yourself to aid us!
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_XARHORKUR_000_0010<tab>Here are the requisite materials─and I have more where that came from if you require it. With them, I'd like you to craft a set of metallic casings.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_XARHORKUR_000_011<tab>Here are the requisite materials─and I have more where that came from if you require it. With them, I'd like you to craft a set of storage pouches.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_XARHORKUR_000_012<tab>Here are the requisite materials─and I have more where that came from if you require it. With them, I'd like you to craft a set of warming cinders.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_XARHORKUR_000_013<tab>When your work is finished, you'll want to deliver your goods to our supplier. He'll see to it that they find a new home.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_XARHORKUR_000_020<tab>You are in possession of hand warmer materials already, are you not? Then all is well.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_XARHORKUR_000_030<tab>Ah, I see you've run out of materials. Here you are─a spare set.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_040<tab>Yes? And what business might you have with me?

TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_041<tab>What splendidly crafted components! And with such impeccable timing, as well... We've seen more of our warmers requiring maintenance of late, so this is much appreciated.

TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_042<tab>Ah, I see you've brought more replacement components for the hand warmers! I'd be delighted to pass these on to our workers. Thank you as always for the assistance.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_SUPPLYMANAGER_000_043<tab>Work will proceed all the smoother with fresh hand warmers at our side. Thank you again for providing the spare parts.

TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_VUYARGUR_000_050<tab>So you've crafted and delivered the warming components, have you? My thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Laboring in the cold is no easy task, but the warmth you've provided means our work will proceed apace.

TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_VUYARGUR_000_051<tab>Perhaps you are wondering why we do not simply “dress” for these climes, as others might. We Yok Huy have thicker skin than other races, you see. Our bodies are naturally resistant to cold...for the most part.

TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_VUYARGUR_000_052<tab>Unfortunately, the skin on our fingers is comparatively thin, so we must take care to keep them warm when the mountain grows merciless. The work is grueling at times, yes...but with fresh hand warmers, we have little to fear.
TEXT_BANYOK105_05340_VUYARGUR_000_053<tab>Your support here means a great deal to us all, so allow me to thank you once more on the project's behalf. As ever, I eagerly await your next innovations.
